name: Infected Zombie War: Shooting
description:
The war against zombie has broken out and people are in immediate danger of a gory death. As a survivor and zombie, it’s up to you to make the streets your battlefield and shoot your way through numerous challenging levels. Zombie Sniper Hunter is an all new zombie shooting game with wonderful graphics, unmissable if you are a fan of thrillers or shooting games.

Keep your eyes open and keep your finger on the trigger as you try to ensure your survival in a virus ravaged world. Upgrade your weapons as a survivor and zombie terminator in frontline fighting, enhance your arsenal of weapons, such as sniper guns shotgun and rifles.

Rescue innocent people from the zombies. People screams for help. Be brave and save the people. Be hero.

Different high quality levels, realistic sound effects, realistic weapon animations.

Come and experience a truly immersive 3D world and excellent graphics in this zombie action game! The zombie apocalypse may have happened, but that’s no reason to just give up.

Take on the role of a zombie against the undead targets and shoot your way to victory over this zombie purgatory of more than 96 levels. If you’re a FPS and shooting game fan, then Zombie Sniper Hunter is your next adventure!
Stunning 3D Graphics

A horde of zombies are upon you. Will you escape or shoot your way out? Zombie Sniper Hunter is an amazing, fully realized 3D zombie apocalypse complete with fantastic undead animations and graphics, it is the next level in smartphone thriller and shooting games.
